verses.verse: Then I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and, behold, in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> that was above the head <S%H7218><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> there appeared <S%H7200><s%> over them as it were a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a throne <S%H3678><s%>.

And he spake <S%H559><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Go in <S%H935><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the wheels <S%H1534><s%>, even under the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> thine hand <S%H2651><s%> with coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, and scatter <S%H2236><s%> them over the city <S%H5892><s%>. And he went in <S%H935><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>. thine hand: Heb. the hollow of thine hand

Now the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on the right side <S%H3225><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, when the man <S%H376><s%> went in <S%H935><s%>; and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>.

Then the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went up <S%H7311><s%> from the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and stood over the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>; and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and the court <S%H2691><s%> was full <S%H4390><s%> of the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%>. went up: Heb. was lifted up

And the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cherubims' <S%H3742><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> even to the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, as the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> God <S%H410><s%> when he speaketh <S%H1696><s%>.

And it came to pass, that when he had commanded <S%H6680><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from between the wheels <S%H1534><s%>, from between the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>; then he went in <S%H935><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%>.

And one cherub <S%H3742><s%> stretched forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from between the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> unto the fire <S%H784><s%> that was between the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> thereof, and put <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H2651><s%> of him that was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>: who took <S%H3947><s%> it, and went out <S%H3318><s%>. stretched forth: Heb. sent forth
And there appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a man's <S%H120><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> under their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And when I looked <S%H7200><s%>, behold the four <S%H702><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> by <S%H681><s%> another <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%>: and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> was as the colour <S%H5869><s%> of a beryl <S%H8658><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>.
And as for their appearances <S%H4758><s%>, they four <S%H702><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> likeness <S%H1823><s%>, as if a wheel <S%H212><s%> had been in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a wheel <S%H212><s%>.

When they went <S%H3212><s%>, they went <S%H3212><s%> upon their four <S%H702><s%> sides <S%H7253><s%>; they turned <S%H5437><s%> not as they went <S%H3212><s%>, but to the place <S%H4725><s%> whither the head <S%H7218><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> they followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H310><s%> it; they turned <S%H5437><s%> not as they went <S%H3212><s%>.

And their whole body <S%H1320><s%>, and their backs <S%H1354><s%>, and their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and the wheels <S%H212><s%>, were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, even the wheels <S%H212><s%> that they four <S%H702><s%> had. body: Heb. flesh
As for the wheels <S%H212><s%>, it was cried <S%H7121><s%> unto them in my hearing <S%H241><s%>, O wheel <S%H1534><s%>. it was: or, they were called in my hearing, wheel, or, galgal

And every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>: the first <S%H259><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and the second <S%H8145><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion <S%H738><s%>, and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle <S%H5404><s%>.
And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> were lifted up <S%H7426><s%>. This is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>.

And when the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> went <S%H3212><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> by them <S%H681><s%>: and when the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> to mount up <S%H7311><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, the same wheels <S%H212><s%> also <S%H1992><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> not from beside <S%H681><s%> them.

When they stood <S%H5975><s%>, these stood <S%H5975><s%>; and when they were lifted up <S%H7311><s%>, these lifted up <S%H7426><s%> themselves also: for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in them. of: or, of life

Then the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from off the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> over the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>.

And the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and mounted up <S%H7426><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>: when they went out <S%H3318><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> also were beside <S%H5980><s%> them, and every one stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>; and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was over them above <S%H4605><s%>.

This is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> under the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>; and I knew <S%H3045><s%> that they were the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>.

Every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> apiece <S%H259><s%>, and every one <S%H259><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>; and the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> was under their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%> was the same <S%H1992><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> which I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of Chebar <S%H3529><s%>, their appearances <S%H4758><s%> and themselves: they went <S%H3212><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward <S%H6440><s%>.
